握手而笑的照片；欢快的照片

bilingual.source: Did you see that old photograph that I found?
bilingual.target: 你看见我找到的那张老照片了吗？

bilingual.source: Wildlife photographers aim to photograph animals in their natural habitats.
bilingual.target: 野生动物摄影师的目标是拍摄动物在自然栖息地的照片。

bilingual.source: She unpacked her schoolbag and set the red pouch by a photograph of her grandma.
bilingual.target: 她打开书包，把红色小袋子放在奶奶照片旁边。

bilingual.source: The enlarged photograph revealed more details than the original.
bilingual.target: 扩大的照片揭示了比原始照片更多的细节。

bilingual.source: The old photograph had a grayish tint.
bilingual.target: 这张老照片有带灰色的色调。
编辑后照片变得更清晰的。
编辑后的照片变得更清晰的。
这张老照片随着时间的推移变灰色的。

bilingual.source: She looked mournfully at the old photograph.
bilingual.target: 她悲哀地看着那张旧照片。

bilingual.source: She found a frag of the old photograph.
bilingual.target: 她找到了那张旧照片的一个碎片。

list.abstract: photograph（英[ˈfəʊtəɡrɑːf]，美[ˈfoʊtəɡræf]），英语单词，作名词用，为照片；相片。作动词用，为给…拍照；在照片上显得。短语搭配有take photograph（拍照），例句为“Please include a recent photograph in your application.（请在申请中附上一张近照。）” photograph不及物动词类近义词有take a photo、to take a picture，名词类近义词有picture、pix，复数形式为photographs。

歌曲介绍英国硬摇滚乐队DefLeppard（威豹乐队）演唱歌曲，收录于专辑《Pyromania》。在最伟大的100首英文歌曲中位居第96位。乐队简介DefLeppard（威豹乐队）是一支1977年在英国谢菲尔德成立的硬摇滚乐队，现有贝斯手萨维奇、主音歌手埃利奥特、鼓手阿伦、主音吉他手科伦和吉他手坎贝尔五名成员。该乐队是英国重金属新浪潮的代表性乐队之一，也是1980年代欧洲最成功的重金属乐队之一，其在全球销售专辑超过6500万张。

yingyinNormal.en: And at that meeting, that's when that photograph was taken.
yingyinNormal.zh: 照片就是拍摄于那次会议。

yingyinNormal.en: And what happened after this photograph was taken, Detective?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这张照片拍完之后发生了什么，警探？

yingyinNormal.en: Tell me where you took this photograph, what undoubtedly could be called the band's most well-known image?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是在哪里照的这张照片，这张可以说是那个乐队最著名的照片了。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, look, I'm not trying to ask you to forgive him being in that photograph.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会试着让你们原谅他出现在那张照片中。

yingyinNormal.en: I've got something to show you. Look. What is it? It's a photograph. Who do you think it is?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有东西给你看。看，这是什么？这是一张照片，你觉得这是什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Now, Calvin Underwood hated himself for going to that meeting. He hated himself for taking that photograph.
yingyinNormal.zh: 凯文·安德伍德痛恨自己参加了那次会议，也痛恨自己拍下了那张照片。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, that is my father in that photograph, I'm not going to deny it. But the truth is he wasn't in the Klan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，照片上的人是我父亲，我不会否认。但事实是他不是三K党的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, whoever stole that photograph and vandalized that billboard, they're not trying to unearth some big scandal about my past, 'cause it just isn't true.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那盗取了照片，破坏了广告牌的人，他们的目的不是要揭露关于我过去的重大丑闻，因为真相并非如此。

yingyinNormal.en: It's in your wallet. That was the gift. The photograph. The wallet was just something I could put it in. So, I put it in a little slot, the little picture holder in there. I thought it'd be cute.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在你的皮夹里。那张照片是一份礼物。只有钱包放的进去 所以我把他放在小暗袋里，在小暗袋里找到，我觉得这很有趣。

yingyinNormal.en: He said he wants to photograph snow leopards. How about that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说，他想拍摄雪豹。是什么呢？

yingyinNormal.en: She and her colleagues gently extract you from the surrounding sediment, measure and photograph all the bits and pieces they find, and begin the complex task of reconstructing how and when you lived based on the evidence they find in your bones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她和她的同事们小心翼翼地把你从周围沉积物中取出，测量、拍照对他们发现的一点一滴，然后基于他们在你骨骼中发现的证据开始复杂的工作，重现你如何以及何时生活过。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 摄影的；逼真的；照片的
n. 摄影师；照相师；摄影家

sense_info_list.en: a picture taken by a camera

examination_example.sentence: They are rare among <highlight>photographs</highlight> of that age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那个年代，这样的照片很少见。

examination_example.sentence: Why did most Victorians look stern in <highlight>photographs</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么大多数维多利亚人在照片上看起来都很严肃？

examination_example.sentence: As a historian, I've become preoccupied with looking for <highlight>photographs</highlight> that show our Victorian ancestors smiling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为一名历史学家，我一心寻找那些展现维多利亚时代祖先微笑的照片。

sample.mean: n. 照相复制品；复印件

examination_example.sentence: In the film, which will be called Finding Jack, Dean will be recreated on screen with CGI based on old footage (影片镜头) and <highlight>photographs</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这部名为《寻找杰克》的电影中，通过基于旧影片镜头和照片的计算机成像技术(CGI)，迪安将会被再现在屏幕上。
根据现有的照片工作是很棘手的。

examination_example.sentence: If anything is really wrong, you can just take <highlight>photographs</highlight> of the damage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果真的出了什么问题，你可以拍下损坏处的照片。

examination_example.sentence: A NASA satellite orbiting over Portugal took <highlight>photographs</highlight> that reveal the effects of pollution from ships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一颗在葡萄牙上空运行的美国宇航局卫星拍摄的照片揭示了船舶污染的影响。

examination_example.sentence: Being multicultural often falls back on weaving children of color into <highlight>photographs</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成为多元文化往往意味着把有色人种的孩子照进照片中。

examination_example.sentence: Polar bears-like all wild animals-should be <highlight>photographed</highlight> from a safe distance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 北极熊和所有野生动物一样，应该在安全的距离外拍摄。

examination_example.sentence: I loved the colorful <highlight>photographs</highlight> in the books.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我喜欢书中的彩色照片。

examination_example.sentence: One fall, my wife Elli and I had a single goal: to <highlight>photograph</highlight> polar bears.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一年秋天，我和我的妻子埃利有一个单一的目标：拍摄北极熊。

examination_example.sentence: But how do you choose and share your <highlight>photographs</highlight> properly?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是如何正确地选择和分享你的照片呢？

examination_example.sentence: In total, more than a thousand living things were <highlight>photographed</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总共有超过一千种生物被拍摄下来。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>photographed</highlight> the sign for Hay Street.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我拍摄了海伊街的标志。
